item.description: "Do not miss this opportunity" I am proud to announce Linda Fitzpatrick - She is the owner of the Cave A'Vin - A wine bar in New Haven - Linda is offering 'Wine Education" Wine 101 - Introduction to Wine Tasting Instructor: Len Gulino, The Wine Tutor www.wine-tutor.com Cave A’ Vin A Wine Bar on State Street 975 State Street, New Haven Call 203-777-6206 for reservations Everything you always wanted to know about wine but didn’t know what to ask – all in a fun, relaxed setting! This class is designed for the wine novice who wants to learn the differences among the major types of wines, and why we like some wines and don’t like others. A variety of foreign and domestic wines will be tasted. Basic terminology 5 S’s of wine tasting 4 taste zones of the tongue 4 basic components of wine Vintage chart Breathing a wine Wine cellar requirements **Minimum person required to conduct class is 10
